## Problem 1 Dice Game

### a
Version 1
```{r}
#'
#'
#'
#'
play_dice_v1 <- function(x){
  net_win = 0
  roll <- sample(c(1:6), size = 1)
  for (i in 1:x){
    if (roll %in% c(3, 5)){
      net_win = net_win + 2 * roll
    }
    else{
      net_win = net_win - roll
    }
  }
  return net_win
}

```
